description: Explore Elon Musk's profound impact on open source software, examining his contributions through Tesla, SpaceX, Neuralink, and The Boring Company. Discover how his visionary approach promotes innovation and transparency across industries.
keywords: Elon Musk, open source software, Tesla, SpaceX, Neuralink, The Boring Company, innovation, transparency, technology, software development, collaboration
title: Elon Musk's Influence on Open Source Software
